article.title: SES Manages Computer Facilities
article.text: ?SES Partners LLC, Huntsville, Alabama, was awarded a $9,999,343 firm-fixed-price contract for the continued computer facilities management services for the Engineer Research and Development Center office of the chief information officer in service of the research, development and environment network. Work location and funding will be determined with each order. Bids were solicited via the Internet with five received. The Army Corps of Engineers, Vicksburg, Mississippi, is the contracting activity (W912HZ-15-D-0007).
